summary: This is an email from 2018 requesting training records and security system information from a correctional office, specifically asking for updates on technician training, camera surveys, and fire alarm, perimeter, and PLC systems. It appears to be administrative correspondence related to institutional operations.

persons.name: MANDATORY TRAINING RECOMMENDED TRAINING EMPLOYEE
persons.context: Appears as a header or label in the training list within the email, likely referring to categories of personnel or records rather than a specific individual.

events.title: Request for Training and System Information
events.description: An email is sent from a CO (Correctional Office) requesting updated information on technician training, camera surveys, and various security systems (fire alarm, perimeter, PLC) from institutional wardens.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 11, 2018, concerning operational requests from a correctional office.
It requests training records for technicians and a camera survey, without needing specific dates, just confirmation of training completion.
It also asks for updates on fire alarm, perimeter detection, and PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) systems, indicating a focus on institutional security and maintenance.
